attributes.action: To make Child Tax Credits more understandable to Parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that parents fully understand what they are entitled to, that the information is input accurately and correctly to stop overpayments happening and parents being forced to pay when MOST of the mistakes lie at fault with the Child Tax Office and when overpayments do happen that they are resolved to mutual benefit of both parties. If the mistake is that of the Child Tax Credit then they should also recoup some compensation for the distress caused to the other party involved

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://search.number-10.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/number10/search.lsim?qt=child+tax+credit+-+lone+parent&sr=0&nh=10&cs=ISO-8859-1&sb=0&hs=0&sc=number10&oq=child+tax+credit&sf=&ha=1100&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
